auth.updatePasswordError: An error occurred while requesting a password change. Please request the change again. If the problem persists, contact the administrators.
auth.emailSentDescription: An email has been sent to your email address. If you find the email in your inbox with the title 'Account Recovery,' please check your spam folder.
auth.expiredRequest: No associated password change request found. This is because the 1-hour time limit has expired or a new password change was requested.
